channel.title: CiTR -- Mondo Trasho
channel.description: Club bangers, chopped-up dancefloor fillers, and the occasional indie pop gem served up with commentary and fabulous prizes.
channel.itunes:summary: Club bangers, chopped-up dancefloor fillers, and the occasional indie pop gem served up with commentary and fabulous prizes.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 20-Feb-2011
item.description: Tunes, friends, prizes, news, and silliness in the studio.
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 23-Jan-2011
item.description: Music and good times. Karen Finley, Johnny Weir, Celine Dion. Radio for ppl who LUV 2 LAFF.
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 02-Jan-2011
item.description: HERP DERP I PLAY MUSICS
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: Special Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 07-Dec-2010
item.description: Maxwell Maxwell fills in for Life on Jump Street while Zeeaa is in Europe! Disco music, news about parties and all-around good times. PLUS: Win tickets to BIG FREEDIA (New Orleans).
item.itunes:subtitle: Filling in for Life on Jump Street.

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 05-Dec-2010
item.description: Queer FM's Aedan Saint fills in. Good times! Parties, disco dancing music, and big fun, only on CiTR 101.9FM.
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 28-Nov-2010
item.description: Music, party fun, technical problems, gee whiz, oh dear.
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 15-Aug-2010
item.description: New music, in your brain, all good, et cetera. Check it!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 18-Jul-2010
item.description:
Xtra special ALL AWESOME x MONDO TRASHO 2-hour spectacular!
Partie muzak from all yr favorite buzzbands including:
THE BOYFRIENDS JHAMEEL THE GOOD NEWS PROTOMEN THE TWELVES SCISSOR SISTERS YOUNG GALAXY THE XX KING KHAN & BBQ SHOW DALER DIAMOND RINGS
DO NOT MISSSSS!
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 27-Jun-2010
item.description: Special live updates from Toronto! Top 10 songs about or by the police! Special guest appearance by some kid who was making a demo in the station!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 16-May-2010
item.description: Fun and games with Max and some new music from the blogs. Misfits tickets are given away. The computer is weird so there is an extended, awkwardly ad-libbed advertisement for the Gallery Lounge and the Ice Cream Social Rock N Roll Club.
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 02-May-2010
item.description:
Keep talkin that blah blah blah.
FREE TIX 4 SHOWS! PARTIE FRIENDS! TRYIN 2 LEARN SERATO BUT IT AIN'T WORKIN! ALL THE BE$T MUZAK! WHOOPEE!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 07-Feb-2010
item.description: Technical difficulties won't get in the way of pop music for all you ungrateful jerks!
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: mondo TrASHo Broadcast on 06-Sep-2009
item.description:  plays hit records.
item.itunes:subtitle: MAXWELLMAXWELLMAXWELL

item.title: Mondo Trasho broadcast on 16-Aug-2009
item.description: Spicy new oonts-oonts techno for superstars. Also a rebroadcast of MT-40's live set on CiTR from last week, in case you missed it. <3 <3 <3
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 09-Aug-2009
item.description: Oonts oonts party techno with LIVE ROCKNROLL IN-STUDIO PERFORMANCE by local heroes MT-40!
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 02-Aug-2009
item.description: Guest host for Show Swap Week! Wheeeeee!

item.title: Parts Unknown Broadcast on 27-Jul-2009
item.description: Parts Unknown gets WAAAACKY for Show Swap Week! wheeee!

item.description: interview w/Jay Spears
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 18-Jan-2009
item.description: Spicy electro sounds even better when played on busted turntables. Thanks, Radio Zero!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: HORRORHOSPITAL
item.description: HORROR HOSPITAL creates an hour of noise from a two-second loop of Beyonce's "Single Ladies." It's completely unlistenable, and it's called "If You Liked It Then You Should Have Put A Ring On It Oh Wait Never Mind You Can't."
item.itunes:subtitle: Live on CiTR's 24 Hours of Radio Art 01.17.09

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 11-Jan-2009
item.description: Some new party jams for yr pleasure. Great vintage Atari commercial as well.
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 28-Dec-2008
item.description: We return to podcasting the show with the first semi-decent episode in a while. Featuring Best of 08 as well as a passing judgement on a bunch of shitty music. The host has been drinking heavily, as usual.
item.itunes:subtitle: The last episode of 2008!

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 28-Sep-2008
item.description: Enjoy some tunez. Someone wins stuff. Can you see the shiny new logo?
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 14-Sep-2008
item.description: So my new pal Ed from Hexes and Ohs calls me on the phone and we chat about his cool band and my old pal SWAPTION is in studio and we throw down some disco and bangerz and mellow stuff too cuz we know you guys heart mellow stuff in addition to bangerz. <3<3<3<3<3<3
item.itunes:subtitle: With special guests: SWAPTION and Hexes and Ohs.

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 10-Aug-2008
item.description: Secret hilarious note: the next DJ wasn't there, so I put on an overnight playlist consisting of trance podcast interspersed with Cher's "Believe" played 50 times in a row.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: mOnDO TRASHO Broadcast on 03-Aug-2008
item.description: Special Pride interviews; Pemberton coverage.
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: TRAAAANNSSFOOORRRMMMEEERRRZZZZZZZZZZ
item.description: LOL WAT

item.description: Ladyrawk quickly devolves into Daft Punk VS Backstreet Boys.

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 06-Jul-2008
item.description: Oh lord, why bother?
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 08-Jun-2008
item.description: We're joined by Owen from butterontheendive.ca. Max can't pronounce "Endive," we sample some tasty wine, talk about local food, and give away Islands tickets.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: mondo trasho Broadcast on 01-Jun-2008
item.description: rockin rollin dance muzak. tune in next week to win islands tickets!
item.itunes:subtitle: with maxwell maxwell

item.title: Mondo Trasho, Broadcast on 25-May-2008
item.description: Who knows what goodies this night's episode contains? I was drunk at the MIA concert and the lovely Ming filled in for me with an extra special serving of aural treats.
item.itunes:subtitle: With special guest Ming!

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 25-May-2008
item.description: Hooray! Party! Yay!
item.itunes:subtitle: With special guest host Ming!

item.description: ALL VINYL SHOW! Wheeee! Fucked Corpse + Whitney Houston = extra deliciousness.

item.description: LOL PARTY
item.itunes:subtitle: with maxwell maxwell!

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 23-Mar-2008
item.description: Jeez, I don't even know. Whatever. I'm tired.

item.title: mondo trasho broadcast on 16-Mar-2008
item.description: Special guest SWAPTION brings in some electro, and we try to figure out how to work my new ROBOT DJ things.

item.title: mOnDO TRASHO Broadcast on 02-Mar-2008
item.description: LOLOLOLOL WHAT?

item.title: Mondo Trasho Broadcast on 10-Feb-2008
item.description: You're a ghost, la la la la la la la.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: MoNDO tRASHo Broadcast on 27-Jan-2008
item.description:
So apparently MSTRKRFT is now writing their name ~*MSTRKRFT*~ and I think that's stupid.
Whatever. Got a good listener call. He was all hawt and bothered and I told him about my fluids.
item.itunes:subtitle: with maxwell maxwell

item.title: mOnDO TrASHo Broadcast on 06-Jan-2008
item.description: We're back for the new year with more shitty Eurotrash music. All sorts of good stuff, from Cloetta Paris to Canada's own VNDLSM. We discuss my fabulous couture and Intern Matt's birthday. We don't give anything away this episode.
item.itunes:subtitle: WitH maxWELL MaxWeLL

item.title: MoNDO tRASHO Broadcast on 18-Nov-2007
item.description: Loves it.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: Mondo TrasHO Broadcast on 11-Nov-2007
item.description: Uhhhh... live mix. What?
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: mOnDO tRASHo Broadcast on 21-Oct-2007
item.description:
Music, people win tickets to Russian Futurists, etc.
What's important is the first installment of HARRY POTTER EROTIC FAN FICTION MASTERPIECE THEATRE!!!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: mONdO tRAsHO Broadcast on 14-Oct-2007
item.description: An experiment gone terribly wrong: how much booze can Max ingest while still providing you with tunes? How much booze can Max ingest before dying of alcohol poisoning? Listen in and find out! Oh yeah, and we play some Ladytron, Spoon, Feist, various other indie rock and electronica, and somebody wins tix to see Ted Leo. Loves it!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: mONDo tRAsHO Broadcast on 07-Oct-2007
item.description:
Win a date with Maxwell Maxwell! He'll take you for sushi, malt liquor, and you get to go see the Pipettes for free! Then it gets broadcast on CiTR! Email winadatewithmax (at) maxwellmaxwell.com with a short description of why you'd make our listeners LOL.
Oh yeah, and we played a bunch of music and bugged you guys to donate.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: MonDo TrAsHo Broadcast on 23-Sep-2007
item.description:
"Smalltown Boy" themed show: songs with "boy" in the title, someone wins tickets for correctly guessing that the second version of "Smalltown Boy" I played was by Herman Dune. Lots of trashy electro, pop, and indie rock.
Oh yeah, and last-minute shout-out to Britney Spears and her sexiest fan, Chris Crocker ("LEAVE BRITNEY ALONE!"). He's got his mother in a whirl, she doesn't know if he's a boy or a girl and neither do I but let me tell you something, I would tap that so fast it'd make your head spin. Grrrrowl.
item.itunes:subtitle: with your host Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: mOnDO tRASHo Broadcast on 16-Sep-2007
item.description: Tonight's episode begins with a smattering of bubblegum pop about the three-chord misery of a broken heart, but later switches to a selection of odd dance-pop.
item.itunes:subtitle: with yr host maxwell maxwell

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 26-Aug-2007
item.description: We talk about the Queer Film Fest, play some rock music, and so forth. Someone wins tix to something rad.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: mOnDO TRasHO Broadcast on 19-Aug-2007
item.description: In her solo radio debut, Carley K spins a variety of rock n ro. Joined in studio by that dude from that band that plays a lot of shows around town. Mmmmm fudge!
item.itunes:subtitle: With guest host Carley K!

item.title: mOnDO tRASHo Broadcast on 12-Aug-2007
item.description: Rock and roll. People with names beginning with K are eligible to win prizes. Carley K begins her co-hosting duties. We discuss Paris Hilton, deviant sex, Jakarta, and we swear too much. Eep.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell & Carley K!

item.title: MoNDo tRASho broadcast on 29-Jul-2007
item.description: ZOMG WTF Drunk in studio! Win tix to Blood Bros.! Lots of dance music! I love the Robots Vs Kids remix of 1, 2 Step!!!! Followed by 15 minutes of Sad Panda.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell and Jamie D!

item.title: SHOUTY SHOW Broadcast on 08-Jul-2007
item.description: LOLZ
item.itunes:subtitle: eep

item.title: MOndO tRASHo Broadcast on 08-Jul-2007
item.description: Drinking, Bush-bashing, a 1992 George Carlin special, and electrofunky fun. Also some poor soul wins tix to see Polyphonic Spree.
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: mONDO tRAshO Broadcast on 01-Jul-2007
item.description: Lots of dancey pop music. Some lucky ho wins tix to Matt & Kim!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: A Very Special Queer FM Broadcast on 01-Jul-2007
item.description: Guest DJs AllNightDanceParty heat things up with a great big set, we give you the skinny on Rufus W and Jake G, and a variety of music is played as Max fills in for Heather on CiTR's Queer FM.
item.itunes:subtitle: Guest Host: Maxwell Maxwell from CiTR's Mondo Trasho!

item.title: mOnDo TrAsHo Broadcast on 17-Jun-2007
item.description: A variety of rock music. Also, wait for the pills to kick in around the half-hour mark!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Apr-2007
item.description: Last show of the season. Some rock music is most likely played and we talk about stuff. See if I care.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: mONDo tRAsHO Broadcast on 01-Apr-2007
item.description: New UBC student soc prez Jeff Friedrich joins us for chit-chat, celeb gossip, and African pop music. Free tickets to see Mew! The Arcade Fire is growing on me, even if it is Dave Matthews Band for indie-rawk frat boys. Technical problems galore! Somebody needs to donate about 3 gajillion dollars to get the CiTR studio A) fixed and B) gold-plated.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 25-Mar-2007
item.description: All sorts of goodness. Harry Potter fills in for Max today. Somebody wins tix to Regina S's concert. Rock and roll music for the unwashed masses. Yum yum yum!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: mONDO tRasho Broadcast on 18-Mar-2007
item.description: Lots of good stuff, bookended by technical difficulties. How many covers of Olivia Newton-John's "Physical" can you take?
item.itunes:subtitle: with Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 04-Mar-2007
item.description: Mondo Trasho, serving up fresh and funky pop sensations. Exclusive interview with a certain former AMS president. Dragonforce giveaway. Rockzorz!!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!!!

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 18-Feb-2007
item.description: New rock music. Britney goes bald and I don't care! Fat Tuesday is coming up. More music. Yay.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 11-Feb-2007
item.description: More Arcade Fire, less Anna Nicole Smith, and the world is worse off for it. The Winks, Shades of Gray, Josie Cotton, Kasabian, TV On The Radio. More TV On The Radio when we play clips of a slurring, drunk, incohereenenenet Anna Nicole at the American Music Awards. Next on Mondo Trasho, uh, FREAKIN GENIUS! Nnn if I ever.. makesh n album, I want him to produshe ME n make me beauuuuutifullll duets.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: MONDO TRASHO pt 2 Broadcast on 28-Jan-2007
item.description: Shades of Gray play some more songs live in studio. More inane questions for them! More indie pop dance rock party pants explosion.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: MONDO TRASHO pt 1 Broadcast on 28-Jan-2007
item.description: Miss Becky hosts the first hour. Shades of Gray live in studio. Pop and rock and indie and stuff. We give away Pete Yorn tix and the band takes requests.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell and Miss Becky!

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 21-Jan-2007
item.description: Funky hippity-hopping rock muzik. Special Funky Georgy Bush segment. Some sad songs. New Patrick Wolf. Weird cover of Britney Spears' "Toxic". Ends with the Pipettes doing "I Think We're Alone Now."
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 14-Jan-2007
item.description: Two hour show! Miss Becky hosts the first hour. We give away tix to Emily Haines!!! Yay!!!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: MONDO TRASHO RADIO Broadcast on 10-Dec-2006
item.description: Rock and roll songs, played loud and fast. Celebrities fail to make their appearances. We take pictures in the studio. Johnny McGovern's new album rules. Aimee Mann's Xmas album sucks. These shoes are three hundred dollars. These shoes are three hundred dollars. These shoes are three hundred dollars. Let's get 'em.
item.itunes:subtitle: Avec Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Broadcast on 26-Nov-2006
item.description: We are joined by the lovely author MJ Pearson in-studio for an in-depth interview re: her book. It turns out the kind of tired-looking older guy videotaping people at last night's party we DJed at was the singer from Franz Ferdinand. One lucky lady wins a ticket to see the Dears. Indie rock is played. Drunk with our own power, we accidentally spin "SEXY LADIES" by Justin Timberlake. A good time is had despite this.
item.itunes:subtitle: With your charming host, Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 05-Nov-2006
item.description: November 5, 1986: Max is plopped inelegantly into the world. 20 years later, he's downtown getting drunk and, for some reason, celebrating. Who knew?
item.itunes:subtitle: Special pre-recorded birthday episode

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 29-Oct-2006
item.description: Happy Halloweekend! A selection of horrifyingly good covers (and some that are just horrifying). Why Bob Dylan's terrible new musical is more important than global warming. Becky gets CiTR's frequency wrong on-air. Max is equally incompetent.
item.itunes:subtitle: Hosted by Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: MONDO TRASHO Broadcast on 22-Oct-2006
item.description: A mediocre show today. Someone wins tickets to Islands, and we spin a variety of hot dancey indie poppy acoustic electroclash whatever. Rufus Wainwright, The Knife, Avenue D, Cazwell, Boycrusher, et cetera. Yum. Phone sex.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Oct-2006
item.description: Forecast today: mostly indie electronica with a smattering of rock, punk, and dancey dancey. Scattered prize giveaways, highs in the 80's.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Oct-2006
item.description: T-Bag from the Phudge Packerz is in-studio to show us their new album! Bex, our Cute Shoes Correspondent, tells us good stuff. Rock music is played, and we're trashy.
item.itunes:subtitle: With Maxwell Maxwell!
